seo.title: UPI Autopay | Recurring Payments API Integration | Decentro
seo.description: Enable automated recurring payments with UPI Autopay by Decentro. Simplify subscriptions and recurring billing for your business. Get started today.
seo.ogTitle: UPI Autopay | Recurring Payments API Integration | Decentro

productBanner.heading: UPI Autopay
productBanner.tagline: Enable seamless recurring payments on your platform with UPI Autopay for bills, EMIs, OTT subscriptions, insurance, mutual funds, and more.

tableOfContents.text: What is UPI Autopay Intent Flow?
Why Decentro’s APIs for UPI Autopay?

inlineImageAndParagraph.text:
The UPI Autopay is a landmark initiative by NPCI that allows users to use their bank accounts to transfer funds to merchants on a recurring basis. It is an easy-to-use, secure, and reliable solution to collect all your recurring payments. UPI AutoPay or UPI Mandates allows merchants to set up a recurring monthly/weekly/daily/on-demand payment to be debited from customers via UPI mode.

This helps the merchants reduce their follow-up time with customers, and increase the conversion rate of paid customers with zero manual efforts.

With a recurring payment facility, the NPCI aims to provide a more convenient way for customers to pay for things that they use every month or on a routine basis and merchants get ensured about the credit of this payment into their accounts on a timely basis.

inlineImageAndParagraph2.subheading: Mandate Registration Flows Powered by Decentro
inlineImageAndParagraph2.text: Decentro supports three types of mandate registration flows to offer seamless, user-friendly automation:

bulletPoints.title: Intent Flow with Mandate Links
points: Decentro generates dynamic deep links and common links that redirect the payer to their UPI app.
After mandate registration (or failure), the payer is redirected to the platform’s app.

bulletPoints.title: Intent Flow with QR
points: Decentro generates a dynamic QR code that can be displayed on an app or website.
The payer scans the QR, selects their UPI app, and registers the mandate seamlessly.

bulletPoints.title: Collect Flow
points: The payer enters their VPA (UPI ID) where they want the mandate to be registered.
They navigate to their UPI app, authorize the request, and enter their UPI PIN.

items.title: High Drop-Off Rates
items.description: Manual payment collection leads to missed deadlines and revenue loss.

items.title: Complex Infrastructure
items.description: Businesses struggle with managing multiple integrations and compliance.

items.title: Scalability Challenges
items.description: Growing transaction volumes require a reliable and automated collection system.

items.title: Customer  Experience
items.description: Users demand hassle-free, automated payment setups without repeated approvals.

useCases.tagline: Get recurring payments enabled on your platform via UPI Autopay

block1.heading:
Custom UPI Handles
for Payees
block1.paragraph: Let users deposit recurring funds using your customized UPI handle.

block1.heading:
Flexible
Debits
block1.paragraph: Set e-Mandates for payment collection at regular/on-demand intervals.

block1.heading:
Recurring
Payments
block1.paragraph: Schedule the automatic payment of all monthly bills to simplify the process.

block1extra.heading:
One-Time
Authentication
block1extra.paragraph: Automated Payments require a one-time UPI PIN for authentication purposes.

block1extra.heading:
Pre-Debit
Notification
block1extra.paragraph: The user is notified of any upcoming debit transactiont, helping in an improved success rate.

block1extra.heading:
Real-time
Updates
block1extra.paragraph: Get instant payment-related reports and insights directly on your dashboard.

data.text: Digital content providers can now automate recurring payments for their customers and charge them using UPI Autopay on a weekly/monthly/on-demand.
UPI Autopay comes very useful in debiting monthly/yearly premiums for health, automobile, house, etc, from the party.
Let users contribute towards their monthly saving goals by helping them set up an Auto-debit plan that transfers money to your VA.
Merchants can now charge for all the monthly installments by setting a one-time e-Mandate that the customer approves via one-time authentication.
Struggling to convert one-time donations to continuous monthly donations? UPI Autopay can be the next breakthrough. Create e-mandates that auto-debits from donors’ accounts every month.
Banks & other lenders can set monthly EMI auto-debits from the user’s account toward loans or other services.

inlineImageAndParagraph3.text: Digital content providers can now automate recurring payments for their customers and charge them using UPI Autopay on a weekly/monthly/on-demand.

inlineImageAndParagraph4.text: UPI Autopay comes very useful in debiting monthly/yearly premiums for health, automobile, house, etc, from the party.

inlineImageAndParagraph5.text: Let users contribute towards their monthly saving goals by helping them set up an Auto-debit plan that transfers money to your VA.

inlineImageAndParagraph6.text: Merchants can now charge for all the monthly installments by setting a one-time e-Mandate that the customer approves via one-time authentication.

inlineImageAndParagraph7.text: Struggling to convert one-time donations to continuous monthly donations? UPI Autopay can be the next breakthrough. Create e-mandates that auto-debits from donors’ accounts every month.

inlineImageAndParagraph8.text: Banks & other lenders can set monthly EMI auto-debits from the user’s account toward loans or other services.

bulletPointsAndTextBlock.bulletPointsHeader: Why Decentro’s APIs for UPI Autopay?

bulletPoints.text: Fully compliant UPI transaction flows as an RBI-certified payment aggregator.
Fully flexible API-based flow for registration and presentation.
The client can have their own UPI handles and even send pre-debit notifications.
Fully API-based flow compared to SDK flows provided by other players.
Callbacks for registration as well as debits and credits into the mapped VA.
Sub-merchant onboarding for all clients on their own handles.
Unlimited rollover of unused API hits with Multiple banking partners.

textAndButtonBannerTransparent4.text:
Real-time Payments. 5X Reduced Collection Costs. UPI APIs For Your Business
Sign-up Today, Go Live Tomorrow!
